title: Banca del Mezzogiorno – MedioCredito Centrale - Wikipedia
snippet: Istituto Centrale per il Credito a Medio Termine a Favore delle Medie e Piccole Industrie was found in 1952 as a statutory corporation (Italian: ente di diritto pubblico) and part of the Mediocredito initiative. title: Mediocredito Centrale|Invitalia
snippet: Mediocredito Centrale - Banca del Mezzogiorno was acquired by Invitalia in August 2017 to develop synergies with the offer of incentives to enterprises and to promote growth policies.

title: Updates on Banca del Mezzogiorno - MEF Department of Treasury
snippet: Within the context of the project, on 13 September 2010, ICCREA Holding Spa (the industrial company of the System of Banks of Cooperative Credit – BCC) and Poste Italiane announced that together they have begun to explore the possible acquisition of Mediocredito Centrale (MCC) from Unicredit ...
